original_title: Postal workers protest opposite Diyatha Uyana
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A protest organized by the Joint Postal Trade Union Front was held opposite the Diyatha Uyana on Friday (08).
They were demanding solutions to the salary issue and protesting against the sale of the Nuwara Eliya and Kandy post offices.
A heated situation arose between the Police and the protesters, during the protest.
